title: Rudd slams Garrett’s ‘megalomaniac’ slur
text:
Kevin Rudd was a megalomaniac, ex-Labor MP and Midnight Oil frontman Peter Garrett tells Sunday Night Sophie Aubrey News Corp Australia Network Kevin Rudd was a megalomaniac, ex-Labor MP and Midnight Oil frontman Peter Garrett tells Sunday Night Sophie Aubrey News Corp Australia Network Peter Garrett: Rudd was a megalomaniac 0:30 
Courtesy: Channel Seven. 13 hours ago /video/video.news.com.au/News/ 
FORMER Labor minister Peter Garrett has stood by labelling former prime minister Kevin Rudd a power-hungry megalomaniac and has slammed his “unbelievably poor” treatment of Julia Gillard. 
Mr Garrett, 62, makes the scathing assessment of the ousted Labor leader in his biography Big Blue Sky , which is set to be released on Wednesday. 
He divulged the details in a tell-all interview for the Seven Network’s Sunday Night program. 
And these weren’t the former Midnight Oil frontman’s only blistering criticisms of Mr Rudd, who demoted him as environment minister after the government’s failed pink batts scheme . 
Mr Garrett says in his book that supporting Rudd in light of his “trail of destruction and abandoned policy” was his biggest mistake in nearly 10 years in Parliament. 
This morning, a spokesperson for Mr Rudd hit back at Mr Garrett’s claims, saying his account was not reliable. Other Stories
